Q1) What do you know about heart attacks? ü´Ä

Q2) What are the symptoms of a heart attack?

There can be several symptoms of a heart attack, Angela. It‚Äôs important to remember that CHEST PAIN or PRESSURE are the most common symptoms. Common symptoms in women are:
